item.description:
Enneagram at the Movies - Crazy, Stupid Love
We'll see a great movie "Crazy, Stupid Love" and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start the movie to clearly see types and relationship dynamics in the movie, including subtypes. Lots of fun. Dinner and snacks provided! Mostly single people attend.

Vegetarian Dinner 7:00 Movie 8:00

When Cal Weaver (Steve Carell) discovers that his wife (Julianne Moore) wants to end their marriage, he reluctantly faces the unwelcome prospect of single life with the counsel of the younger and smoother super-bachelor Jacob Palmer (Ryan Gosling). Meanwhile, Cal's adolescent son, Robbie (Jonah Bobo), has formed an unquenchable crush on his 17-year-old babysitter (Analeigh Tipton) -- but is she more interested in Robbie's recently unwed father?

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, workshop leader, therapist, phone coach and author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com

            781 648 3737      

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Personality Types in the Movies - Crazy Stupid Love
